title: Automated Agent Testing Suite via Wolfram Language

reasoning.problem: Formalize the existing ad-hoc response to AgentGladiator instability by proposing the creation of an Automated Agent Testing Suite leveraging Wolfram Language. This suite will enforce rigorous pre-deployment validation, mitigating future operational disruptions. The suite should include performance benchmarks, failure mode analysis, and resource consumption profiling. This is to prevent more AgentGladiator-type failures and optimize resource allocation.
